Start: ^Ah, I must say that I'm more than a little surprised that you're real. The traders often have a way of exaggerating the news that they bring us.
next1: ^Let me begin by saying that - if you have need, and wish to - you may take anything from our garden. We trade and donate what we can, but still we find that we often have more than we need.
next2: ^Please, if you have any questions, just ask.
^I am a security Droid, here to assist you

g-0: ^Oh, it seems that the traders were right about this detail. Frankly, I had hoped that you would be able to speak. I’ll be mindful to ask you questions that you answer in future.
